passive.name: IONIAN FERVOR
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) IONIAN FERVOR
                                Hitting enemies with abilities grant 3-17% () bonus Attack Speed for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 timesAt max stacks, attacks deal an additional 25 magic damage (25~150 () + 30% bonus ) on hit.Attacking enemy champions refreshes the duration.An ability grants multiple stacks upon hitting multiple champions.

q.name: (Q) BLADESURGE
q.description:
(Q) BLADESURGE
 9/8/7/6s   20 
                                
                                
                                Dashes through an enemy, dealing 48 physical damage (10/40/70/100 + 65% ) and healing herself for 9 (16/20/24/28% ).Bladesurge's cooldown is refreshed if the target was Marked or dies to Bladesurge.When aimed, Bladesurge will prioritize targets it will reset on.Deals 150% damage to minions.

w.name: (W) DEFIANT DANCE
w.description:
(W) DEFIANT DANCE
 14/13/12/11s   75/80/85/90 
                                
                                
                                Hold: Defends with her blades for up to 1.5 seconds, taking 50% (60 + 7% ) reduced damage.Release: Whips the blades forward, dealing 49 physical damage (20/35/50/65 + 50%  + 40% ), increased by up to 100% with charge time.Cannot be interrupted.

e.name: (E) FLAWLESS DUET
e.description:
(E) FLAWLESS DUET
 12/11/10/9s   50 
                                
                                
                                Send a blade to target location.May be recast within 3 seconds to send another blade.The blades converge upon reaching their destination, dealing 80 magic damage (80/130/180/230 + 80% ), stunning for 1 second, and Marking enemy champions and large monsters hit for 5 seconds.

r.name: (R) VANGUARD'S EDGE
r.description:
(R) VANGUARD'S EDGE
 70/65/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Fires a storm of blades that deals 125 magic damage (125/250/375 + 70% ) and Marks enemy champions for 5 seconds.The blades explode into a wall for 3 seconds upon hitting an enemy champion. The bladewall deals 100 magic damage (100/225/350 + 70% ) and slows by 90% for 1 seconds.
